history.proof: intros P a tr s ms H1 H2. sauto lq: on depth: 3use: trace_access_Terminating.

ctx: intros P a tr s ms H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: intros P a tr s ms H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall ms' : MetaState state, state_enable a s ms' -> exists s' : state, P s' /\\ ms' = Terminating s'" on hypothesis of type "state_enable a0 s NonTerminating".

ctx: intros P a tr s ms H1 H2.
intros P a tr s ms H1 H2.

original: intros P a tr s ms H1 H2. induction H1. - exists s. auto. - apply H2 in H. destruct H as [ms' [H3 H4]]. apply H0 in H4. destruct H4 as [s' [H5 H6]]. apply H6 in H3. destruct H3 as [s'' [H7 H8]]. exists s''. split. + apply H5. + apply trace_access_Terminating with (s' := s''). * apply H8. * apply H3.
